sentence.idiomatic: She has a very cute puppy.
I plan to get a cat.
Mom won't let us to get a dog.
What fun things are there to do in Shanghai? Recommend some things for us.
The restaurant we are going to today is the one that she recommended.
This is the person she recommended--he should be a fairly reliable person.
He would like to find a lively, outgoing girl to be his girlfriend.
This child is very lively, everyone likes him.
Your dog is so obedient. He's not at all high-spirited.
Mother hopes she will be a mellow, well-behaved baby.
A person who is too meek will suffer.
He hopes to marry a mild, lovable wife.
I am convinced that as long as she undergoes specialized training, she will definitely become a star.
When everyone else was training, he, on the other hand was off to the side goofing off.
As soon as I saw their family dog I knew he had gone through training.
She put a lot of thought to make a sumptuous dinner. She didn't realize that her husband wouldn't be home for dinner today.
He complained to us that more and more he couldn't understand his girlfriend's thoughts.
How is it possible that I don't know your thoughts.
When she was small her parents paid attention on developing her ability to be independent.
Nowadays, it is not easy for a family to support a university student.
I think you are too serious, you need to develop a bit of a sense of humor.
We all never realized she is such a selfish person.
I feel that no one is unselfish.
Even you have come up with such a selfish idea.
I want to get a dog. Could you recommend some good breeds?
That depends on what you like. Some people like dogs that are a little more lively, others like a more docile dog.
The more obedient, the better. I’ve heard that some small dogs are very noisy and that big dogs, on the other hand, are quiet.
That’s not completely true. Actually, the most important thing is training.
Do you have to put a lot of thought into it?
Of course. Keeping a dog is like raising a child—the owner must concentrate on showing the love, and training it. This is a dog owner's responsibility.
Huh? It’s a lot more trouble than I had imagined. I was only thinking about having a dog to keep me company and to play with me.
No way. Your thinking is too selfish. You are not ready at all to take care of a dog.
Yeah. I think I still need to take good care of myself first.
